author: Ivan Mehta
title: Daily Distraction: The origin of Facebook’s ‘pandemic’
description: For the last couple of weeks, we’ve been seeing and hearing the word pandemic a lot. The word means that a disease has spread to multiple countries and continents, affecting a large percentage of the population. Do you know what else is a pandemic? Facebook a…
content:
For the last couple of weeks, weve been seeing and hearing the word pandemic a lot. The word means that a disease has spread to multiple countries and continents, affecting a large percentage of the population.
